description:
Montreal, Oct. 22, 2012 - Maxime Noël presents dynamodb-mapper -- a DynamoDB object mapper, based on boto.

Useful links:
* dynamodb-mapper: https://bitbucket.org/maxnoel/dynamodb-mapper
* MP32: http://montrealpython.org/2012/10/mp32/
* Montreal Python: http://montrealpython.org
* Savoir-faire Linux: http://www.savoirfairelinux.com
title: DynamoDB and DynamoDB-Mapper #MP32
